text: Gardner and Tinsley Filling Station, also known as the West's Gas Station, is a historic gas station located near New Cambria, Macon County, Missouri. It was built in 1931, and is a one-room, with one room addition, single story Bungaloid style gasoline station. This small, frame, hip-roofed rural gas station sits on an abandoned section of Old U.S. Route 36 and has a drive- under canopy. (includes 6 photographs from 2001) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2002. ==References== Category:Gas stations on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Bungalow architecture in Missouri Category:Commercial buildings completed in 1931 Category:1931 establishments in Missouri Category:Buildings and structures in Macon County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Macon County, Missouri
title: Gardner and Tinsley Filling Station
